entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High zero.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 4.
